TEXT.English: Viceroy is a relatively easy difficulty level - good for when you want to try a new strategy. Barbarians are not too strong and your people are more forgiving, resulting in higher stability. You might find the UHVs too easy after a few games with RFCE.
TEXT.Chinese: Viceroy is a relatively easy difficulty level - good for when you want to try a new strategy. Barbarians are not too strong and your people are more forgiving, resulting in higher stability. You might find the UHVs too easy after a few games with RFCE.

TEXT.English: The challenges definitely start to ramp up on Monarch. Barbarians are a threat now, upkeep is higher, your people are harder to please so you may run into frequent stability issues, and your computer opponents are just plain smarter. This is the most balanced level for RFCE, the UHVs should be fairly challenging.
TEXT.Chinese: The challenges definitely start to ramp up on Monarch. Barbarians are a threat now, upkeep is higher, your people are harder to please so you may run into frequent stability issues, and your computer opponents are just plain smarter. This is the most balanced level for RFCE, the UHVs should be fairly challenging.

TEXT.English: Are you ready to be an Emperor? If so, you will need to prove yourself by overcoming a lot of difficulties. Raging barbarians, strong opponents and difficult finances, while it is much harder to keep your people statisifed, thus your state stable. Can you achieve all UHVs in time? This is a true test for Civ experts.
TEXT.Chinese: Are you ready to be an Emperor? If so, you will need to prove yourself by overcoming a lot of difficulties. Raging barbarians, strong opponents and difficult finances, while it is much harder to keep your people statisifed, thus your state stable. Can you achieve all UHVs in time? This is a true test for Civ experts.
自动进行游戏剩余回合数: %d1_Num

TEXT.English: A Mutual Protection Pact - Each Party Agrees to Automatically Declare War if the Other Party is Attacked.
TEXT.Chinese: 共同防御协定――双方同意在对方遭到第三方攻击时自动向其宣战。

TEXT.English: Check the Interior Advisor (F2) for details
TEXT.Chinese: 查看内政顾问界面(F2)了解详情

TEXT.English: Check the Victory Conditions (F8) for details
TEXT.Chinese: 查看胜利条件界面(F8)了解详情

TEXT.English: This order will consume one or more Great People (of different types) and initiate a Golden Age (extra [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).
TEXT.Chinese: 这项命令将消耗掉一个或多个（不同类型的）伟人并开启黄金时代（额外增加[ICON_PRODUCTION]、[ICON_COMMERCE]与[ICON_GREATPEOPLE]）。

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Archery Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units get a special first-strike ability that allows them a chance to hit their opponent before regular combat begins.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, you have trained your first Archery Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units get a special first-strike ability that allows them a chance to hit their opponent before regular combat begins.

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Light Cavalry Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units can move very fast, allowing them to wreak havoc behind enemy lines.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, you have trained your first Light Cavalry Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units can move very fast, allowing them to wreak havoc behind enemy lines.

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Heavy Cavalry Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! The strongest units in the medieval armies, while still considerably fast. If you have access to both iron and horse, don't hesitate to build them!
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, you have trained your first Heavy Cavalry Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! The strongest units in the medieval armies, while still considerably fast. If you have access to both iron and horse, don't hesitate to build them!

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Polearm Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! They are effective against both Light and Heavy Cavalry units - use them to break the mounted dominance on the battlefields!
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, you have trained your first Polearm Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! They are effective against both Light and Heavy Cavalry units - use them to break the mounted dominance on the battlefields!

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Heavy Infantry Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These melee units form the backbone of your armies.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, you have trained your first Heavy Infantry Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These melee units form the backbone of your armies.

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Siege Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units cause collateral damage to the tiles they attack, damaging multiple units at once.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, you have trained your first Siege Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units cause collateral damage to the tiles they attack, damaging multiple units at once.

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Gunpowder Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! All units whose weaponry is based on gunpowder can ignore man-made city fortifications.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, you have trained your first Gunpowder Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! All units whose weaponry is based on gunpowder can ignore man-made city fortifications.

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Naval Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Protecting coastal cities is a crucial part your national defense. Naval units can also blockade enemy towns, preventing them from working adjacent water tiles.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, you have trained your first Naval Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Protecting coastal cities is a crucial part your national defense. Naval units can also blockade enemy towns, preventing them from working adjacent water tiles.

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2City_Name! The nationality of this unit is invisible to your rivals, so you may use it to attack their ships without having to declare war. You may also blockade and plunder rival trade routes without having to be at war.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, you have trained your first [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2City_Name! The nationality of this unit is invisible to your rivals, so you may use it to attack their ships without having to declare war. You may also blockade and plunder rival trade routes without having to be at war.

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2City_Name! This unit is invisible to other players, which allows you to enter into their territory to gather intelligence and to perform Espionage Missions. Be aware, however, that even though it cannot be seen, this unit still has a chance to get caught when operating in rival territory, possibly revealing its identity and causing tension in your international relations.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, you have trained your first [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2City_Name! This unit is invisible to other players, which allows you to enter into their territory to gather intelligence and to perform Espionage Missions. Be aware, however, that even though it cannot be seen, this unit still has a chance to get caught when operating in rival territory, possibly revealing its identity and causing tension in your international relations.

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have completed your first National Wonder ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1Building_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These powerful buildings are useful for specializing your cities - it is wise to plan ahead, though, as only two National Wonders can be built in each one.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, you have completed your first National Wonder ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1Building_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These powerful buildings are useful for specializing your cities - it is wise to plan ahead, though, as only two National Wonders can be built in each one.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have connected your first city (%s1City_Name) with your Capital. Because the cities are connected, they will share resources and increase their commerce.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have connected your first city (%s1City_Name) with your Capital. Because the cities are connected, they will share resources and increase their commerce.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have gained access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT], an important strategic resource! Cities with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] can build strong melee units.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have gained access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT], an important strategic resource! Cities with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] can build strong melee units.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have gained access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT], an important strategic resource! Cities with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT] can build fast mounted units.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have gained access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT], an important strategic resource! Cities with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT] can build fast mounted units.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have gained access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT], an important strategic resource! Cities with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] can build strong melee units.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have gained access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT], an important strategic resource! Cities with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] can build strong melee units.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have gained access to your first luxury resource ([COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1Luxury_Name[COLOR_REVERT])! This resource will create happiness in all cities connected to your Capital, making your citizens easier to manage.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have gained access to your first luxury resource ([COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1Luxury_Name[COLOR_REVERT])! This resource will create happiness in all cities connected to your Capital, making your citizens easier to manage.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have gained access to your first food resource ([COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1Food_Name[COLOR_REVERT])! This resource will raise the health level in all cities connected to your Capital, encouraging faster growth.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have gained access to your first food resource ([COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1Food_Name[COLOR_REVERT])! This resource will raise the health level in all cities connected to your Capital, encouraging faster growth.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You now possess the knowledge required to found [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_corporation[COLOR_REVERT]. You may use a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] to build the Headquarters in any city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s3_bonus_list[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You now possess the knowledge required to found [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_corporation[COLOR_REVERT]. You may use a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] to build the Headquarters in any city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s3_bonus_list[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of One Hundred Thousand souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of One Hundred Thousand souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of Two Hundred Thousand souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of Two Hundred Thousand souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of Five Hundred Thousand souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of Five Hundred Thousand souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of One Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of One Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of Two Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of Two Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of Five Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of Five Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of Ten Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of Ten Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of Twenty Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of Twenty Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of Fifty Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of Fifty Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!

TEXT.English: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of One Hundred Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations, the burgeoning %s1Civ_Name now reached an urban population of One Hundred Million souls! Larger cities allow more citizens and specialists, increasing our productivity!

TEXT.English: The %s1 lost the wonder %s2, it has been destroyed!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1 失去了奇迹 %s2, 它已经被毁灭了!

TEXT.English: The %s1 lost the wonder %s2, it has been captured!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1 失去了奇迹 %s2, 它现在被别人控制!

TEXT.English: The Amount of Money Spent on Colony Maintenance

[NEWLINE]%d1[ICON_GOLD]: Distance Maintenance[NEWLINE]%d2[ICON_GOLD]: Number of Cities Maintenance[NEWLINE]%d3[ICON_GOLD]: Extra Expenses from Oversea Cities[NEWLINE]%d4[ICON_GOLD]: Company Payments[NEWLINE]------------------------[NEWLINE]------------------------[NEWLINE]TOTAL CITY MAINTENANCE COST: %d5[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.Chinese: [NEWLINE]%d1[ICON_GOLD]: Distance Maintenance[NEWLINE]%d2[ICON_GOLD]: Number of Cities Maintenance[NEWLINE]%d3[ICON_GOLD]: Extra Expenses from Oversea Cities[NEWLINE]%d4[ICON_GOLD]: Company Payments[NEWLINE]------------------------[NEWLINE]------------------------[NEWLINE]全部城市维护费: %d5[ICON_GOLD]

TEXT.English: A %s1_ImpName has been destroyed by a marauding %s3_civ_adjective %s2_UnitName!
TEXT.Chinese: A %s1_ImpName has been destroyed by a marauding %s3_civ_adjective %s2_UnitName!

TEXT.English: A road system has been made impassable by a marauding %s2_civ_adjective %s1_UnitName!
TEXT.Chinese: A road system has been made impassable by a marauding %s2_civ_adjective %s1_UnitName!

TEXT.English: "We are afraid our nation is not stable enough."
TEXT.Chinese: "We are afraid our nation is not stable enough."
